ca.ualberta.cs.team16app

Class ClaimAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
      • ca.ualberta.cs.team16app.ClaimAdapter

  • public class ClaimAdapter
extends
    This is the CustomStoryAdapter Class. This custom adapter is used to populate the ListView of the Offline and of the Online Library.
